posts.post_content:
Hi, I am still building an all PSA graded T206 portrait subset.

But, I am also collecting low to mid grade Polar Bear action shot cards - - either raw or graded.

Let me know if anyone has any you are looking to sell.  We can then discuss specific cards.  I don't currently have too many.  But, I am not looking for portraits.   Just action shots.

Thanks.
